features: Our Oatmeal and Shea Butter Body Lotion helps to instantly hydrate and soothe dry skin
Gently nourishes for smooth, healthy-looking skin
It is made with 100 percent natural moisturizers and contains
Apply as often as required all over your body
body.description: Keep calm and soothe on! Our Soothing Oatmeal and Shea Butter Body Lotion gently nourishes for smooth, healthy-looking skin. It’s great to use on your hands and body. Apply this rich, creamy lotion all over your body for naturally healthy-looking skin. Infused with wholesome oats and sweet smelling shea butter, this lotion is a non-greasy formula made with 100% natural moisturizers (plant based glycerin and soybean oil), to absorb quickly to comfort skin. Our oats are harvested from oat grains grown in fields across the USA. These wholesome, healthy grains are known to soothe and calm skin. Shea butter comes from nuts of the shea tree which are native to Africa. Rich shea butter is famous for indulging skin with intense moisturization Who knew soybeans had natural moisturizing properties? Well we did actually. That’s why we put it in our lotions. Soybean oil is a real smoothie, gliding onto the skin and soaking right in. Our soybeans come from the fields of the USA, and nothing else sneaks in during the extraction process - our soybean oil is as nature intended; 100% natural. Natural Ingredients: Moisturizing soybean oil Oatmeal extract Shea butter extract Tell me more! This hand and body lotion is paraben free, dermatologist tested, absorbs instantly, and is made with plan-derived ingredients. It is made with 100% natural moisturizers and contains up to 25% recycled plastic. Be sure to recycle upon disposal. How to use: Squeeze 1-2 pumps of lotion into your palms & spread all over body. Rub in small circular motions with gentle pressure to awaken your skin. Use daily to give your skin that TLC it deserves!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Made with 100% Natural Moisturizers of Soybean oil and Plant Based Glycerin* Our oats are harvested from oat grains grown in fields across the USA Absorbs instantly, and is made with plant-derived ingredients* Made with 100% natural moisturizers* Non-greasy formula St. Ives Body Lotion Oatmeal and Shea Butter 21 oz Gently Nourishes for Smooth, Healthy-Looking Skin St. Ives Hydrating Body Lotion Vitamin E and Avocado helps defend against dryness for healthy looking skin. It's made with 100% natural moisturizers of soybean oil and plant based glycerin, helping to restore your natural glow*. Vitamin E is famous for enhancing skin's smoothness. The oils from avocados are known for their moisturizing qualities. Our soybeans come from across the USA, and nothing sneaks in during the extraction process - our soybean oil is as nature intended; 100% natural*. St. Ives Body Lotion Oatmeal and Shea Butter 21 oz

St. Ives: Get to Know Us! Want to know how to get glowing skin? You’ve come to the perfect place. Our products were all made to bring the joy of nature to your skin while making it glow- all without crossing into shiny skin territory (not cute). That’s why our entire lineup features 100% natural moisturizers, exfoliants, and extracts*! We also just really, really love apricots. Think of St. Ives as your go-to for great-smelling cleansers, lotions, masks, and body washes you can use on the daily to get glowing skin that feels super-hydrated and oh-so-silky smooth. Did we mention we’re America’s one of the best**? **Based on 52 week unit sales ending 7.30.16

Our Body Lotions Goodbye, dry skin! Skin-smoothing lotions packed with 100% natural moisturizers (like soybean oil and plant based glycerin) sooth, smooth, and let your skin live its softest life*. *Claim based on the ingredients used in the manufacturing of the product. Note: For detailed ingredient list, please check the manufacturer website.

How to Use To instantly hydrate depleted skin, press 1-2 pumps of lotion into palms and smooth all over, concentrating on extra-dry spots like elbows and heels. Massage lotion in until absorbed. *Pro-tip*: Use small circles to boost blood flow and awaken skin!

St. Ives Acne Control Scrub Apricot St. Ives Soothing Body Wash Oatmeal and Shea Butter St. Ives Hydrating Body Lotion Vitamin E and Avocado Recommended St. Ives Products Gently cleans pores and helps stop breakouts before they occur Gently soothes dry skin and leaves your skin soft and smooth Made with 100% natural moisturizers to hydrate your skin and restore your natural glow*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lotion
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this lotion and is the only one I can actually put on my face and not break out. I'm sad because they have stopped selling it in the stores around me and I'm so happy that I found it on Amazon a little more than what I would usually pay but it's so worth it. Doesn't have an overwhelming scent isn't super oily and moisturizes your skin well without causing breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This really works!
reviews.reviewText: My skin was parched and dry in Vegas. Here, I doesn’t matter if its summer or winter, the water is sucked out of you in the desert climate. So the moment this got delivered, I didn’t wait for a shower, I ripped into the box and slathered it on my hands and smelled it. Kind of a medicinal odor. I didn’t care. I worked it into my forearms and watched as the white scaly skin turned back into its natural color. I hadn’t put my makeup on and my face hurt, so I put a generous amount all over my face, including my eyelids. It felt so good I spread the excess down onto my neck. I almost heard my skin go “aaaahhhhh…” There was absolutely no burning around my eyes which surprised me, as some of my very expensive facial creams warn against getting close to the eyes, and if you’ve ever experienced stinging, crying eyes, you know why. But with this simple drugstore St. Ives lotion, all I felt was good.I got curious so I started reading the bottle. Aptly named Nourish and Soothe, it said it was made of 100% natural ingredients. Nice. I turned to the back label and it confirmed my experience. Soothing hydration, non-greasy…says it intensely hydrates. The only thing that didn’t jive was the warning in caps; avoid contact with eyes. But I wasn’t worried. Mine were still saying thank you.The ingredient list doesn’t seem 100% natural, but if your skin is hurting from dryness, just don’t read it. If you don’t like the smell, be patient. It fades. From my perspective, 21 ounces of relief for under $10 that is gentle enough for my eyes but strong enough to turn tough skin on my feet soft is pretty incredible. Take a shot and buy it. I don’t think you’ll be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars St Ives is a great lotion and is hard to find now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No greasy feel
reviews.reviewText: I really like this brand with the Shea butter, as it doesn’t leave a greasy feel after you put it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It made my scalp happy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my scalp. Yep, that's weird, but I was sick and tired of my scalp being dry and flaking and I was ready to try anything. I put the lotion in one of those narrow tip bottles that they use for hair coloring and I applied the lotion where my head was itchy. I had been using scalp oils and none of them really moisturized, but this gave me relief from the itching and I don't have flakes anymore! I do need to mention that I confirmed that I didn't have any other scalp issues/infections going on, it was just a dry scalp.I worked in a med spa and had access to all sorts of expensive, fancy-pants products but I really trust the St. Ives products. So when I needed something for my scalp, I immediately went to them. This "flavor" has a little bit of a neutral scent, and it absorbs completely and doesn't leave a residue. And the small amount that gets on my hair makes my hair soft...even though that is not the intent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Lotion! Works Well, Smells Great!
reviews.reviewText: I am a frequent user of vegan and organic products due in large part to the fact that there is no active government body which regulates chemicals used in food or cosmetics. While this product is not vegan or organic by any means, it is a great, inexpensive substitute to use in between purchases.It works wonders on dry skin and even eczema. I applied some to mine and my husband's cracked hands and knuckles, weathered from working long hours in the wintery cold. Doing this just a few times in one day significantly improved our discomfort and left our hands feeling soft and smooth. It does feel a bit greasy after application (any lotion that claims it feels otherwise is simply not telling the truth), but by blotting a few times with a towel just enough to not slip off of slick surfaces or leave a lotion-y residue (i.e. touch phones) that quickly resolved the issue. I also rubbed some of the lotion into his sore spots where his eczema flares up. While it did not heal him completely, it did help to reduce his desire to itch.I truly love the scent of this lotion. It is sweet (but not overpoweringly so) and calming. I'm a big believer in aromatherapy and the power that certain scents have to relax the nerves. I often purchase items with lavender in them for this very reason. However, this scent had a surprising effect on me (and my husband!). We couldn't stop sniffing our hands after applying it to our cracked knuckles, and each time we did so, smiles spread across our faces. It's not quite "fresh baked cookies at grandma's house." More of a "coming home after a long day of work and drinking some good tea" type feeling. It really puts you in a good mood, and I imagine it would give you an extra "clean" feeling when applying fresh out of the shower.My only concern with this product lies in one of its ingredients. There are a handful of ingredients in this product of which to be wary, but none that are cause for too much concern. These are mostly potential irritants to those who have particularly sensitive skin. Although, I have VERY sensitive skin and I had no adverse reactions to this product. However, there is one ingredient listed called cyclopentasiloxane that does worry me a bit. While it is ranked as one of the lower toxins on ewg.org, it is still linked to cancerous tumor formation in animal studies when given at moderate doses according to the Dow Corning Corporation. This certainly isn't a product I would use every single day of my life only because of the amount of ingredients I can't pronounce let alone identify without a reference, but in small doses I don't think it would be particularly harmful. This is just my personal preference.Overall, I really like this product. It works well, smells great, and gives me very little concerns in terms of chemical content. I would definitely recommend this to a friend or family member, especially one who is experiencing extreme dryness with their skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product, works great for my skin!

reviews.reviewTitle: ST. IVES CREMA NUTRIENTE CON INGREDIENTI 100%NATURALI
reviews.reviewText: Predilego il body lotion Oatmeal/Shea butter di St. Ives perché idrata ed assorbe istantaneamente e non unge o lascia tracce sui vestiti. L'idratazione è fantastica, più di qualsiasi altra crema. Inoltre, abbraccio la loro filosofia "100% NATURAL", senza parabeni, con ingredienti vegetali. Consiglio vivamente.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 3, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Great for my skin and smells lovely. Pricy as imported but well worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: I am happy with it in general
reviews.reviewText: I have dry skin and this product really worked for me! The texture of the moisturizer is very light, it absorbs quickly and is non sticky. The fragrance was very pleasant and subtle. The moisturization lasted half the day for me. I am happy with it in general.

reviews.reviewTitle: The best moisturizer in the market
reviews.reviewText: The best body moisturizer/lotion in St.Ives Series.... I have been using this for over a year now (Vaseline is now a thing of the past for me) and its extremely good, is not sticky and does not leave a foul smell that Vaseline used to leave earlier. I definitely recommend anyone using a moisturizer to try this for sure and you wont regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: smells lovely good value for money
reviews.reviewText: doesn't feel greasy, smells lovely good value for money. The pump didn't work very well at first but seems to be ok once I got it going.
